data.name: Overflight
data.description:
Unveil the truth about unknown heroes fighting in the aftermath of World War II.

The war is finally over. Skilled pilots looking for new occupation have spread all over the world. You are one of them, a mercenary, smuggling a mysterious package for an unknown, powerful client. Things go south when you realize that the package contains fake documents for fleeing Nazis. 

Overflight Campaign will take you to the uncharted lands of South America to engage in a conflict that can define the final results of World War II. Immerse yourself in a unique story-driven VR experience with fully-fledged characters, intense dogfighting action and take part in the most breathtaking missions ever encountered on Mobile VR.

After you save the world, enjoy Overflight for hours in the multiplayer mode. Here, the game changes into a semi-realistic VR dogfight with dynamic action and constant adrenaline rush. Play with your friends or challenge the community! 

See you in the skies of Overflight!

changelog.change_log:
- re-implemented friends invite for the custom games;
- fixed a possible crash in the second mission (campaign).

* remastered map (Hills)
* ability to switch between the servers
* multiplayer improvements
* in-game info on connection status
* improved in-game interface
* new graphic features
* minor backfeeds

*New playable plane - Messerschmitt BF109
*New playable battlefield - Canyon
*New planes skin - available in four colors
*Redesigned user interface
*Added Single Player modes - Freeflight & vs AI
*No internet connection required for Single Player modes
*Implemented new score system
*Bug fixes
*Gameplay and technical improvements

Fly through the air and shoot other planes down with new Gear VR Controller.
Now with support for XBOX One S Bluetooth controller.
Note: XBOX One S Bluetooth controller is only supported with the latest firmware update. If it doesn't work properly, please search for "How to Update Your Xbox One Controller on Windows 10" or contact us.

Play together launching Overflight from Oculus Rooms' Group App Launcher
Better performance on Snapdragon S7
Fixed most of networking errors
Please send feedback and other issues to hello@setapp.pl

Voice chat for private games
Better gamepad handling
Option to swap gamepad sticks
Fixed networking issues
Fixed license verification issue
Performance optimization

Added gamepad and internet check
Fixed networking issues
Added color mark for players
Added Volume controller

Added gamepad and internet check
Fixed networking issues
Added color mark for players
Initial Version (Updates suggested by Aaron Davies in emails)
